ovs.tests.selenium package¶

Submodules¶

ovs.tests.selenium.selenium_base_test module¶

The base test case for selenium that all other selenium tests should inherit from.

class ovs.tests.selenium.selenium_base_test.SeleniumBaseTestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: flask_testing.utils.LiveServerTestCase

The base test case for selenium that all other selenium tests should inherit from.

create_app()[source]¶

Creates a flask app instance for each test. :returns: a flask app. :rtype: Flask

go_to_page_in_dropdown(page_link_name, dropdown_id)[source]¶

Clicks a dropdown and then selects the page to go to under that dropdown. Navigating to other pages requires doing this quite a bit.

Parameters:
  • dropdown_id (string) – The ID of the dropdown to click.
  • page_link_name (string) – The name of the link that appears after clicking the dropdown.
login_default_admin()[source]¶

Convenience method to login with the default admin information.

login_default_resident()[source]¶

Convenience method to login with the default resident information.

login_with_credentials(email, password)[source]¶

Logs in with the provided email and password. :param email: Email to log in as. :param password: Password to use.

setUp()[source]¶

Creates a headless chrome instance for Selenium and clears the DB.

set_text_field_by_id(field_id, new_text)[source]¶

Sets the text in the given text form to the new text. :param field_id: The html form id. :param new_text: The text to type.

tearDown()[source]¶

Closes selenium driver and OVSBaseTestCase clears the DB.

ovs.tests.selenium.table_test module¶

Base test class for tests related to responsive tables.

class ovs.tests.selenium.table_test.InputTextElement[source]¶

Bases: ovs.tests.selenium.table_test.RowTextElement

Text fields that can be modified.

get_text(table_element)[source]¶

Same as parent base class.

Parameters:table_element (WebElement) – The element of this type to get the text from.
Returns:the text on the element.
Return type:string
set_text(table_element, new_text)[source]¶

Same as parent base class.

Parameters:
  • table_element (WebElement) – The element of this type to set the text for.
  • new_text (string) – What to set the text to.

class ovs.tests.selenium.table_test.RowTextElement[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a WebElement that contains a text element in a row of the table.

class ovs.tests.selenium.table_test.TableTest(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: ovs.tests.selenium.selenium_base_test.SeleniumBaseTestCase

Base test class for tests related to responsive tables.

add_table_test(*args)[source]¶

Tests that *args can be added to the table through the form correctly.

Parameters:args – The text to put in the form from top to bottom.
add_to_table(*args)[source]¶
Sets the text in the form based on *args and the order of self.form_text_field_types
then adds the entry to the table.
Parameters:args – The text to enter in the form fields.
click_delete_last_row()[source]¶

Clicks the delete button for the last row on the table.

click_last_row_button_at_index(index)[source]¶

Clicks the button in the last row of the table at the passed in index.

Parameters:index (int) – The row index for the button to click.
click_update_last_row()[source]¶

Clicks the update button for the last row on the table.

get_last_table_row()[source]¶

Gets a list of WebElements corresponding to the data for the last row in the table.

Returns:The last row in the table.
Return type:List of WebElement
navigate_to_table_page()[source]¶

Subclasses need to override this to get to the page with the corresponding table. Assumes that the page is currently reachable using the menu bar at the top.

setUp()[source]¶

Creates a headless chrome instance for Selenium and clears the DB.

set_last_row_fields(*args)[source]¶

Sets the fields in the last row of the table to *args from left to right.

Parameters:args – The text to set the fields to from left to right. None will skip setting that field to anything new.
update_delete_table_test(*args)[source]¶

Tests that the table can be updated with *args from left to right. Also tests that rows can be deleted from the table.

Parameters:args – The text to update in the table from left to right.
verify_last_row_fields_match(*args)[source]¶

Verifies that the fields in the last row of the table match *args left to right.

Parameters:args – The text to verify left to right. None will skip over that field.
Returns:True if all fields match expected values, False otherwise
Return type:boolean

Tests that meal plans can be used and credits go down, and up for an undo.
